About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Greetings! I'm Siddhartha, an India-based information security engineer. I earned a Bachelor's in Computer Science and Engineering from Manav Rachna International Institute of Research and Studies followed by a Master's in Information Security from Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology from India. My expertise lies in Cryptography and Malware analysis, nurtured through dedicated research. I'm all about making digital spaces safer. As a skilled Information Security practitioner, I seek exciting opportunities with a broad skill set covering essential facets of Information Security.
